18:22 <vmassol> sdumitriu: hi. Would you remember why Blog.Categories document has a Blog.CategoryClass xobject?  
18:23 <vmassol> in this xobject, there's a name xproperty with a value of xe.blog.code.blogcategories and it gets displayed as is in the object editor  
18:24 <vmassol> see http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/attachment/32757/bug.png  
18:28 <vmassol> and in Blog.BlogPostClass we hsould probably use a HQL query instead of using the xclass name in order to exclude the CategoryTemplate document  
18:28 <vmassol> (which has a name of "CategoryName")

22:12 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> has joined #xwiki  
22:12 <abusenius> has quit  
22:13 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> If I have a bunch of pages in the wrong place after importing with XWiki (from MediaWiki), what can I do to either 1) undo the damage and reimport in the right place or 2) move all of them to the place I want them?  
22:13 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> The TableView doesn't seem to offer mass-delete or mass-move.  
22:23 <tmortagne> has quit  
22:26 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
22:26 <edvorg> has quit  
23:02 <vmassol> xwikiorg\_guest\_8: indeed we're still missing mass actions on livetable. What you can do is script it. Going to bed now. Come back tomorrow or ask on the list if you need more help. See you  
23:03 <vmassol> has quit
